Package com.exedio.cope

Annotation Type Vault

  • @Target({FIELD,TYPE})
@Inherited
@Retention(RUNTIME)
public @interface Vault
    Enables data vault for a DataField.

    This annotation is essentially applicable to features (@Target(FIELD)) that are data fields only. When applying it to other features, there is no effect at all. When applying it to types (@Target(TYPE), it is automatically applied to all features of that type.

    See Also:
    DataField.getVaultInfo()
